Player History
Drafted in 58th round, 918th overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Nestor Urbina (HOU)...
Injured on 6/15/2015 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 3 days...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Hit first career homerun on 8/5/2016, off Carlos Araiza (NY)...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/4/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
8/15/2017: Signed a contract extension with San Francisco, $500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 2/10/2019.
Traded from Houston to St. Louis (C) on 4/6/2019 (Going to STL: 2B James Otis. Going to HOU: 2B George Benegas)...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/27/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
